feature_cards.title: Accept all payments: NFC, EMV, and APMs
Verifone biometrics
feature_cards.text: Enable touchless shopping experiences with Verifone’s biometric authentication module.

feature_cards.title: Verifone Tap
feature_cards.text: Transform everyday devices into secure, scalable payment solutions.

feature_cards.title: Verifone Victa Series
feature_cards.text: Meet the Verifone Victa series, a portfolio of payment solutions

feature_paragraphs.title: Bring seamless experiences to customers
feature_paragraphs.text: Powered by Qualcomm and designed for mobility, Verifone Victa Mobile enables effortless payments and while running Android apps, like POS, loyalty, and inventory management.

feature_paragraphs.title: One device, everywhere
feature_paragraphs.text: Connect with customers anywhere in-store or mount Verifone Victa Mobile for countertop or in-lane. Accept payments of all types, including mobile wallets, with the contactless sensor optimized behind the display.

feature_paragraphs.title: Powerful, streamlined solution
feature_paragraphs.text: Carry a variety of must-have features in one versatile device, with barcode code scanners, integrated e-receipts, and biometric face authentication. The Victa Mobile battery delivers over 12 hours of continuous usage processing payments every 2 minutes.

products.name: Victa Mobile Ruggedized
products.description: Built for the toughest conditions, Victa Mobile Ruggedized delivers secure payments and Android flexibility in a device engineered for durability.

feature_cards.title: IP67 dust and water protection for outdoor durability
IK05 impact rating for rugged reliability
Qualcomm Octa-core processor for fast performance
PCI PTS 6.x compliant, ready for PCI 7.x
Supports tap, chip, and swipe payments

feature_paragraphs.title: Power through extreme environments
feature_paragraphs.text: Victa Mobile Ruggedized is designed for mission-critical commerce in demanding conditions. With IP67 dust and water protection, IK05 impact resistance, and a rugged build, it keeps your team connected and operational—indoors, outdoors, and everywhere in between.

feature_paragraphs.title: One device, anywhere
feature_paragraphs.text: Accept all major payment types—tap, chip, and swipe—with a contactless sensor optimized behind the display. Run Android apps for POS, loyalty, and inventory management on a bright 6.7" HD+ touchscreen, even in challenging environments.

feature_paragraphs.title: Performance that lasts
feature_paragraphs.text: Powered by an Octa-core processor and 8GB RAM, Victa Mobile Ruggedized supports multi-app workflows with speed and reliability. Its 5000 mAh battery delivers over 12 hours of continuous use, so your team can keep moving without interruptions.

products.name: Verifone Victa Portable
products.description: Easily accept payments anywhere and of any type, all on a single device.

feature_cards.title: Verifone biometrics
feature_cards.text: Enable touchless shopping experiences with Verifone’s biometric authentication module.

feature_cards.title: Verifone Tap
feature_cards.text: Transform everyday devices into secure, scalable payment solutions.

feature_cards.title: Verifone Victa Series
feature_cards.text: Meet the Verifone Victa series, a portfolio of payment solutions

feature_paragraphs.title: Engage customers anywhere
feature_paragraphs.text: Designed to go wherever your business takes you, Verifone Victa Portable gives you a powerful, easy-to-use solution that fits in your hand. Powered by Qualcomm and 4 GB of memory, Victa Portable can process payments and run business apps, like inventory and POS.

feature_paragraphs.title: Designed to fit your business
feature_paragraphs.text: Accept payments of any type, wherever customers want to pay. Bring Verifone Victa Portable to the point of interaction or mount it as an integrated POS terminal.

feature_paragraphs.title: Expand the transaction experience
feature_paragraphs.text: Be ready for every step of the customer journey with a variety of innovative tools built into a single, ergonomic device. The Verifone Victa Portable battery can deliver over 12 hours of continuous usage processing payments every 2 minutes.

products.name: Verifone Touch
products.description: Get a first look at the future of in-store engagement. Verifone Touch brings intuitive, touch-driven interactions and dynamic content to retail environments—designed to captivate customers and elevate every moment.

feature_paragraphs.title: Adaptable by Design
feature_paragraphs.text: Fits any setting—pole-mounted, in-lane, or counter—working seamlessly with Victa and other Verifone devices.

feature_paragraphs.title: Built for What’s Next
feature_paragraphs.text: Future-ready architecture supports payment integration and SoftPOS capabilities, helping businesses evolve without replacing hardware.

feature_paragraphs.title: Help Shape the Future
feature_paragraphs.text: Connect with us at NRF to explore deployment models and share input that will influence next-generation retail experiences.

products.name: Victa SoftPOS Mobile
products.description: Run your SoftPOS app and business tools on a sleek, full-size Android device with integrated contactless payments.

feature_cards.title: SoftPOS-ready for Verifone Tap or your own app
6.7" HD touchscreen with integrated contactless reader
Qualcomm Octa-core processor for smooth performance
NFC-enabled digital receipts and barcode scanning

feature_paragraphs.title: SoftPOS-ready, enterprise-focused
feature_paragraphs.text: Victa SoftPOS Mobile is designed for merchants who need more than a smartphone. With Android 14, integrated NFC reader, and support for Verifone Tap or your own SoftPOS app, it delivers secure, MPoC-compliant transactions and multi-app workflows—all in one device.

feature_paragraphs.title: Customer-first design
feature_paragraphs.text: Engage customers on a bright 6.7" HD touchscreen. Scan coupons and loyalty codes with the built-in barcode camera. Deliver receipts instantly via NFC-enabled digital options. Victa SoftPOS Mobile combines payment, scanning, and business apps in a form factor that’s easy to carry and built for everyday mobility.

feature_paragraphs.title: Performance that keeps up
feature_paragraphs.text: Powered by a Qualcomm Octa-core processor with 4GB RAM and 32GB Flash, Victa SoftPOS Mobile handles demanding workflows with ease. Its 5000 mAh battery delivers over 12 hours of continuous use, so your team stays productive all day.

products.name: Victa Lane
products.description: Tap to pay. Built to engage. Victa Lane is a sleek, customer-facing payment terminal designed for fast, secure checkout and a modern in-lane experience.

feature_cards.title: Supports tap, chip, and swipe payments
Flexible mounting options for any lane setup

feature_paragraphs.title: Elevate the customer experience
feature_paragraphs.text: Victa Lane brings speed and simplicity to the checkout. With an 8" touchscreen and biometric authentication, it supports tap, chip, and swipe payments while enabling digital receipts—helping retailers reduce friction and keep lines moving.

feature_paragraphs.title: Flexible deployment options
feature_paragraphs.text: Use Victa Lane as a standalone payment terminal or pair it with Victa Register for a unified dual-display setup. Modular mounting options make it easy to fit any lane configuration.

feature_paragraphs.title: Secure and future-ready
feature_paragraphs.text: Victa Lane is PCI PTS compliant and engineered to support advanced payment methods. Backed by Verifone’s global infrastructure, it’s built for high-volume environments where speed and security matter most.

feature_paragraphs.title: Streamline checkout

feature_paragraphs.title: Secure the sale
feature_paragraphs.text: Protect customer data and stay ahead of modern threats with latest PCI certifications.

products.name: Victa Register
products.description: Power at the point of sale. Victa Register combines a large merchant-facing display with Android flexibility and modular accessories—built for secure, scalable checkout in high-volume environments.

feature_cards.title: Octa-core processor for fast, multi-app performance
Android flexibility for POS, loyalty, and inventory apps
Modular accessories for printers, scanners, and cash drawers
PCI PTS compliant for secure transactions

feature_paragraphs.title: Modernize the checkout experience
feature_paragraphs.text: Victa Register is designed for retailers who need speed, flexibility, and reliability at the front line of commerce. With a 14" HD touchscreen and Octa-core performance, it runs POS, loyalty, and inventory apps seamlessly—helping associates serve customers faster and smarter.

feature_paragraphs.title: Built for integration and scale
feature_paragraphs.text: Pair Victa Register with Victa Lane for a unified dual-display experience or deploy it standalone. Modular accessories like printers, barcode scanners, and cash drawers make it easy to customize for any lane setup.

feature_paragraphs.title: Secure and future-ready
feature_paragraphs.text: Victa Register is PCI PTS v7.x compliant and powered by Android 14, ensuring advanced payment workflows and enterprise-grade security. Backed by Verifone’s global infrastructure, it’s built to keep transactions secure and operations running smoothly.

products.name: Verifone Victa Mini
products.description: Compact size. Full-scale performance. Victa Mini delivers secure, versatile payment acceptance in an ultra-portable form factor—perfect for mobile checkout, pop-up retail, and space-constrained counters.

feature_cards.title: Supports tap, chip, swipe, and PIN entry
NFC-enabled digital receipts for fast checkout

feature_paragraphs.title: Small footprint, big flexibility
feature_paragraphs.text: Victa Mini is designed for businesses where space and mobility matter. Whether used standalone or paired with smartphones, tablets, or fixed-lane systems, this sleek device supports tap, chip, and swipe payments with PIN entry and NFC-enabled digital receipts—helping you serve customers anywhere, anytime.

feature_paragraphs.title: Ready for mobile and countertop setups
feature_paragraphs.text: With Bluetooth, Wi-Fi, USB-C, and optional LTE connectivity, Victa Mini integrates easily into your existing workflows. Its intuitive 4" touchscreen and long battery life make it ideal for line busting, curbside service, and pop-up environments.

feature_paragraphs.title: Secure and customer-friendly
feature_paragraphs.text: Victa Mini is PCI PTS compliant and EMV-certified, ensuring every transaction is safe and reliable. Built for speed and simplicity, it helps you deliver a frictionless checkout experience without sacrificing security or flexibility.

products.name: Victa Unattended
products.description: Always on. Always ready. Victa Unattended delivers secure, reliable payment acceptance for kiosks, vending, transit, and self-service environments—built to keep commerce moving without staff intervention.

feature_cards.title: IP65 weather-resistant and IK09 impact-rated design
Supports tap, chip, swipe, and NFC-enabled digital receipts
PCI PTS v7.x compliant and EMV-certified

feature_paragraphs.title: Seamless self-service experiences
feature_paragraphs.text: From vending machines to transit gates to parking kiosks, Victa Unattended is designed for environments where uptime and reliability matter most. These rugged terminals deliver fast, secure tap, chip, and swipe transactions—keeping customers moving and businesses running.

feature_paragraphs.title: Built for integration and scale
feature_paragraphs.text: With IP65 weather resistance, IK09 impact protection, and flexible mounting options, Victa Unattended integrates easily with your systems. Remote monitoring and centralized updates help reduce downtime and service costs, so you can manage fleets of devices with confidence.

feature_paragraphs.title: Always operational, always secure
feature_paragraphs.text: Victa Unattended features a 3.5" touchscreen, integrated barcode scanner, and NFC-enabled digital receipts. Powered by Android 13 and PCI PTS v7.x compliance, it supports contactless payments and advanced payment methods—backed by Verifone’s global infrastructure for 24/7 uptime.

feature_paragraphs.title: Prime for partnering

feature_cards.text: Connect your in-store experience to your online experience with an easily integrated checkout solution.

feature_cards.title: Tokenization
feature_cards.text: Increase your transaction security and tailor the customer shopping experience.

feature_cards.title: Reporting & Analytics
feature_cards.text: Enjoy the benefits of having all your transaction and payment data in a single dashboard.

feature_paragraphs.title: Opportunity is Knocking
feature_paragraphs.text: Experience an all-in-one POS and payment solution that is compact, low-cost and, with a wide range of features and functionality, opens the door to dynamic revenue-building opportunities.

feature_paragraphs.title: Your Business, Your Persona
feature_paragraphs.text: Immerse yourself in the many configuration options suited to your business persona.  Abundant flexibility allows for the POS screen to position horizontally or vertically while payment device configurations allow for positioning either coupled with or separately from the POS.

feature_paragraphs.title: Open for Business
feature_paragraphs.text: Benefit from integration ease with the open Android platform that makes it seamless for developers to port and manage POS applications - allowing you more freedom in creating the perfect ecosystem.

feature_paragraphs.title: A perfect fit for your business

feature_paragraphs.title: Power under the hood
feature_paragraphs.text: Featuring powerful Qualcomm processors, more memory, and Android 13, the M450 and M425 deliver performance for faster, smarter checkouts.  PCI 7.x approval and remote skimmer detection keep your transaction and card information safe.

feature_paragraphs.title: eCommerce Ready
feature_paragraphs.text: Grow your eCommerce business with the forward-facing camera to easily accept Advanced Payment Methods, benefit from the vibrant screen to promote online specials, support buy-on-line return in store, add tokenization to personalize the customer journey and more.

feature_cards.title: Verifone Cloud Services
feature_cards.text: Know what’s happening at key moments in your customer journey through a single, simple API.

feature_paragraphs.title: Personalize​ Interaction
feature_paragraphs.text: Customize content that actively promotes your brand and attracts customers in between each use. Allows you to create interactive journeys that engage customers and provide them with control over their experience.

feature_paragraphs.title: Flexible Framework​
feature_paragraphs.text: Create a great experience no matter what the application – from retail and hospitality to ticketing venues and QSRs, and many more. Whether your customers are checking in at a baseball game or checking out the menu, the K350 has you covered.

feature_paragraphs.title: Seamless Services​
feature_paragraphs.text: Offer customers loyalty rewards, online fulfillment orders, pick up in-store orders, and much more with just a tap of the screen.​

feature_cards.title: Certified Across All Dispenser Types, Payment Networks and Oil Brands
Convenience Store POS
feature_cards.text: Provide a seamless and secure point-of-sale experience with the C18, our comprehensive hardware and software POS solution for convenience, retail and petroleum. Designed to handle payments without the need to recertify existing POS applications.

feature_cards.title: Advanced Payment Methods
feature_cards.text: Provide customer convenience and enjoy a great ROI with APMs to help increase ticket value.

feature_cards.title: Verifone C-Site Management
feature_cards.text: Configure, manage and monitor every aspect of your convenience store through a single pane of glass. Easily integrate into your Commander Site Controller to maintain site ID, site name(s), easily customize dashboards and more.

feature_paragraphs.title: Versatile Site Management
feature_paragraphs.text: Throughput is key for fuel and convenience store owners. Commander site controller offers you a full suite of software solutions that speed up payment acceptance, fueling operations and store management.

feature_paragraphs.title: Extensive Certification
feature_paragraphs.text: Get operational fast. The Commander is certified across all major dispenser brands, payment networks and oil brands.

feature_paragraphs.title: Built for Business Growth
feature_paragraphs.text: Planning on growing? The Commander’s on-prem system architecture  supports mixed dispenser brands and up to 64 fueling positions. Commander site controller can handle the largest businesses with high transaction volumes.

Swap between self-service or cashier-facing POS
Verifone Advanced Payment Methods
feature_cards.text: Open the world of commerce and provide more ways for your customers to pay with payment methods that are quickly becoming mainstream. Access all the certified APM partners with a single integration to Verifone.

feature_cards.title: Site Controllers
feature_cards.text: Enjoy increased speed in payment acceptance, fueling operations and back-office store control with this versatile site management solution.

feature_cards.title: Foodservice Solutions
feature_cards.text: Our robust foodservice offering allows your customers to place an order online or through an interactive kiosk in-store.

feature_paragraphs.title: Purpose-Built for Multi-Purpose
feature_paragraphs.text: Serve your customers efficiently with a tap or flip of the screen. The C18 can be used as both a cashier-facing POS and customer-facing self-checkout kiosk, depending on the needs of your business.

feature_paragraphs.title: Simple to Set Up and Use
feature_paragraphs.text: Get up and running sooner with easy out-of-the-box installation and Commander integration. Customize the point of sale screen layouts to fit your business and increase throughput.

feature_paragraphs.title: Powerful Software
feature_paragraphs.text: The point of sale features a modern, multi-touch UX with gesturing support for speed of service. Fuel purchase, age verification, loyalty and fleet payment flows are a breeze.

Integrated POS
feature_cards.text: Verifone C18 is a comprehensive POS solution for convenience retail and petroleum. It combines hardware and software to provide a seamless and secure point-of-sale experience for businesses, and is designed to handle payments without the need to recertify existing POS applications.

feature_cards.title: Foodservice Solutions
feature_cards.text: Our robust foodservice offering allows your customers to place an order online or through an interactive kiosk in-store.

feature_cards.title: Verifone C-Site Management
feature_cards.text: Configure, manage and monitor every aspect of your convenience store through a single pane of glass. Easily integrate into your Commander Site Controller to maintain site ID, site name(s), easily customize dashboards and more.

feature_paragraphs.title: Fastest Transaction Times
feature_paragraphs.text: Impressive transaction speed in complex environments, with multiple dispenser types and loyalty programs, media, and mobile payment running at once.

feature_paragraphs.title: Ease of Integration
feature_paragraphs.text: Commander EF utilizes standards from IFSF and Conexxus for payment, forecourt control, loyalty and mobile payments, ensuring connection with any POS.

feature_paragraphs.title: Security at the Highest Level
feature_paragraphs.text: Commander EF is certified across all dispenser types, payment networks and oil brands. Increase transaction speed capabilities and efficiency of fueling, payment, security and store control.

feature_paragraphs.title: Unleash the Potential Within

feature_paragraphs.title: Seamless Connectivity Choices

This feature makes it the perfect companion for pay-at-the-table convenience, curbside transactions and efficient line busting. Experience the freedom to serve your customers wherever they are with unparalleled ease.
